title: 3 and Out - NFL Combine Reaction, Top Prospects, Risers/Fallers, QB Class
itunes:title: 3 and Out - NFL Combine Reaction, Top Prospects, Risers/Fallers, QB Class
description:
John reacts to the NFL Combine, including why its time to move the combine to L.A., why Notre Dame's Kyle Hamilton is worthy of a top 5 pick, how much Georgia DT Jordan Davis' freakish 40 will help his draft stock, the biggest question marks surrounding Michigan's Aidan Hutchinson and Oregon's Kayvon Thibodeaux, and if QB's in a weak QB class are worth a first round pick.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
